issues.summary: New user registers an account
issues.description: As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can start using the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can enter their personal information (email, password, etc.).
The system validates the entered information for correctness.
The user receives a confirmation email after registration.
The user can log in with the newly created credentials.

issues.summary: User logs in
issues.description: As a user, I want to log in to access my profile and preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Specific criteria based on story requirements.

issues.summary: User recovers/resets password
issues.description: As a user, I want to recover/reset my password if forgotten.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can request a password reset via email.
The user receives a password reset link.
The user can set a new password using the link.

issues.summary: User updates profile information
issues.description: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that I can share relevant detailswith others.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can access and edit their profile information.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately upon update.

issues.summary: User views other users' profiles
issues.description: As a user, I want to view other users' profiles so that I can find potential matches.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can access and edit their profile information.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately upon update.

issues.summary: User updates sports preferences
issues.description: As a user, I want to update my sports preferences so that the matching algorithm can find suitable matches based on my interests.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can access and update their sports preferences in the app.
The updated preferences are saved and used by the matching algorithm.
The user receives a confirmation of the updates.

issues.summary: Admin adds a new sports activity
issues.description: As an admin, I want to add a new sports activity so that I can keep the list of sports activities up-to-date.
acceptanceCriteria: The admin can add new sports activities to the system.
The added activity is immediately available for users to select.
The system validates the input for correctness and completeness.

issues.summary: Admin edits existing sports activities
issues.description: As an admin, I want to edit existing sports activities so that I can make corrections or               updates.
acceptanceCriteria: The admin can edit details of existing sports activities.
Changes are reflected immediately in the user interface.
The system validates the edited information for correctness.

issues.summary: Admin deletes sports activities
issues.description: As an admin, I want to delete sports activities so that I can remove outdated or irrelevant activities from the list.
acceptanceCriteria: The admin can select and delete sports activities from the system.
The deleted activity is immediately removed from the list available to users.
The system confirms the deletion to the admin.

issues.summary: Admin ensures changes reflect in user's sports preferences
issues.description: As an admin, I want the changes made in sports activities to reflect in user's preferences so that users receive accurate and updated information about sports activities.
acceptanceCriteria: Changes in sports activities are reflected in the user's sports preferences.
The system automatically updates the user's preferences based on the changes.
Users are notified of any significant changes affecting their preferences.

issues.summary: Admin ensures data integrity when editing or deleting activities
issues.description: As an admin, I want to ensure data integrity when editing or deleting activities so that the database remains consistent and free from errors.
acceptanceCriteria: The system maintains data integrity during edit and delete operations.
The database remains consistent and free from errors after changes.
Back-up and recovery procedures are in place in case of data loss.

issues.summary: Developer creates secure endpoints for admin actions
issues.description: As a developer, I want to create secure endpoints for admin actions so that admin actions are protected from unauthorized access or malicious activities.
acceptanceCriteria: Secure endpoints are created for all admin actions.
Endpoints are protected against unauthorized access and malicious activities.
Security tests confirm the robustness of the implemented security measures.

issues.summary: User views a list of available sports activities
issues.description: As a user, I want to view a list of available sports activities so that I can explore new activities to engage in.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can view a comprehensive list of available sports activities.
The list is updated in real-time with new activities.

issues.summary: User links sports preferences to the sports model
issues.description: As a user, I want my sports preferences to be linked to the sports model so that the matching algorithm considers my activity choices.
acceptanceCriteria: The user's sports preferences are linked to the sports model.
The matching algorithm uses these preferences to suggest activities.

issues.summary: User accepts or rejects match suggestions
issues.description: As a user, I want to accept or reject match suggestions so that I can control who I connect with.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can accept or reject match suggestions.
The system updates the user's matches based on their choices.

issues.summary: User sees details about matches
issues.description: As a user, I want to see details about my matches so that I can make informed decisions about potential connections.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can view detailed information about their matches.
The details include relevant information to help make connection decisions.

issues.summary: User sends and receives messages to/from matches
issues.description: As a user, I want to send and receive messages to/from my matches so that I can communicate with potential activity partners.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can send and receive messages with matches.
The messaging system is secure and user-friendly.

issues.summary: User marks messages as read/unread
issues.description: As a user, I want to mark messages as read/unread so that I can keep track of communication.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can mark messages as read or unread.
The messaging interface reflects these changes immediately.

issues.summary: User deletes unwanted messages
issues.description: As a user, I want to delete unwanted messages so that I can manage my inbox effectively.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can delete unwanted messages from their inbox.
The system confirms deletion and removes the messages permanently.

issues.summary: User wants responsive design for seamless usage on different devices
issues.description: As a user, I want responsive design for seamless usage on different devices so that I can use the app comfortably on any device.
acceptanceCriteria: The app has a responsive design, adapting to different device screens.
The user experience is seamless and consistent across devices.

issues.summary: User wants a visually appealing dashboard displaying matches
issues.description: As a user, I want a visually appealing dashboard displaying my matches so that I can access and manage my connections.
acceptanceCriteria: The dashboard is visually appealing with a user-friendly interface.
The dashboard displays matches in an organized and accessible manner.
Users can easily manage and interact with their matches from the dashboard.

issues.summary: Developer conducts unit tests for each component
issues.description: As a developer, I want to conduct unit tests for each component to ensure individual components work correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Unit tests cover each component of the application.
Tests confirm that individual components work correctly.
Test results are documented for future reference.

issues.summary: Developer performs integration tests for API endpoints
issues.description: As a developer, I want to perform integration tests for API endpoints to verify the seamless interaction of different components.
acceptanceCriteria: Integration tests cover all API endpoints.
Tests ensure seamless interaction between different components.
Test results demonstrate the reliability of API interactions.

issues.summary: User experiences a bug-free application
issues.description: As a user, I want to experience a bug-free application so that I can enjoy a reliable user experience.
acceptanceCriteria: The application functions without critical bugs or issues.
Users report a smooth and reliable experience.
Bug tracking and resolution processes are in place.

issues.summary: Developer deploys the application to a reliable hosting platform
issues.description: As a developer, I want to deploy the application to a reliable hosting platform so that users can access the app without interruptions.
acceptanceCriteria: The application is deployed on a reliable and scalable hosting platform.
Users access the app without interruptions or downtime.
Deployment processes are documented and reproducible.

issues.summary: Developer monitors app performance and user feedback
issues.description: As a developer, I want to monitor app performance and user feedback so that I can address issues promptly and enhance user satisfaction.
acceptanceCriteria: Continuous monitoring of app performance is established.
User feedback is regularly collected and analyzed.
Quick response mechanisms are in place for addressing issues.

issues.summary: User wants notifications for new matches and messages
issues.description: As a user, I want notifications for new matches and messages so that I can stay informed and engaged with the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The user receives timely notifications for new matches and messages.
Notifications settings can be customized by the user.
Notifications are clear, concise, and relevant.

issues.summary: Developer implements additional features based on user feedback
issues.description: As a developer, I want to implement additional features based on user feedback so that I can continuously improve the app's functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: Features are prioritized and implemented based on user feedback.
Implemented features are tested and integrated into the app.
Feedback loop is established for continuous improvement.

issues.summary: Developer documents the codebase comprehensively
issues.description: As a developer, I want to document the codebase comprehensively so that new contributors can set up and contribute to the project.
acceptanceCriteria: The entire codebase is thoroughly documented.
Documentation includes setup guides, code comments, and usage instructions.
Documentation is accessible and understandable to new contributors.

issues.summary: User wants data to be secure and private
issues.description: As a user, I want my data to be secure and private so that my personal information is protected.
acceptanceCriteria: User data is securely stored and managed.
Privacy settings allow users to control their data.
Users are informed about data usage and privacy policies.

issues.summary: Developer implements secure authentication and authorization
issues.description: As a developer, I want to implement secure authentication and authorization to ensure user data remains confidential and secure.
acceptanceCriteria: Authentication and authorization mechanisms are robust and secure.
User data remains confidential and secure at all times.
Security measures are compliant with relevant standards.

issues.summary: Developer conducts security testing for vulnerabilities
issues.description: As a developer, I want to conduct security testing for vulnerabilities to identify and address potential security risks.
acceptanceCriteria: Comprehensive security testing is conducted to identify vulnerabilities.
Testing covers all critical aspects of the app.
Identified vulnerabilities are promptly addressed.

issues.summary: Developer implements optimized database queries for better performance
issues.description: As a developer, I want to implement optimized database queries for better performance to ensure the app remains responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: Database queries are optimized for performance.
App responsiveness is maintained or improved.
Optimizations are tested to ensure data accuracy.
